movies.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

details.body: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
details.stars: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton

details.body: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
details.stars: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan

details.body: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
details.stars: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhar

details.body: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.
details.stars: Henry Fonda, Lee J. Cobb, Martin Balsam

details.body: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
details.stars: Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley

details.body: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.
details.stars: Clint Eastwood, Eli Wallach, Lee Van Cleef

details.body: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
details.stars: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinis

details.body: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
details.stars: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page
